flawed_nl_solution:
900 x 3/4 = <<900*3/4=675.0>>675.0 people came before the start of the concert.
900 - 675.0 = <<900-675.0=252.0>>252.0 people did not come before the start of the concert.
252.0 x 5/9 = <<252.0*5/9=140.0>>140.0 people came few minutes after the first song.
So, 140.0 + 80 = <<140.0+80=220.0>>220.0 people came to the concert that was not able to be at the start of the concert.
Therefore, 252.0 - 220.0 = <<252.0-220.0=32.0>>32.0 people did not go to the concert.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 225.0, not 252.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
